verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, the feast of <S%G4634>tabernacles<s%>, <S%G2258>was<s%> at <S%G1451>hand<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret<s%>, and2532, 2212 <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> to be known1511, 1722 <S%G3954>openly<s%>. <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G4160>doest<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> to the <S%G2889>world<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> having <S%G2036>said<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, he <S%G3306>abode<s%> still <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> were gone <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G305>up<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5320>publicly<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2927>secret<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1112>murmuring<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: some3588, Ezekiel3 <S%G3754>said<s%>, He <S%G2076>is<s%> a good <S%G18>man<s%>; others243, 1161 <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G235>so<s%>, but he leadeth the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4105>astray<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when it was <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G3322>midst<s%> of the <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2309>willeth<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%>, he shall <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%>, <S%G4220>whether<s%> <S%G1473>it<s%> is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> whether <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%>.

He that <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Did <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> yet <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4160>doeth<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>? <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> ye to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>?

Moses <S%G3475><s%> hath5124, 1223 <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3756>(not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3962>fathers<s%>); <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G4059>ye<s%> <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3089>may<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G3089>broken<s%>; are ye <S%G5520>wroth<s%> with <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> every <S%G3650>whit<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1492>lo<s%>, he <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G3954>openly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G3379>Can<s%> it be <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G230>indeed<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>?

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> this <S%G5126>man<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G2532>teaching<s%> and <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1492>Ye<s%> <S%G2504>both<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2504>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2064>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> he that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G228>true<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3754>said<s%>, <S%G3752>When<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G3385>come<s%>, will he <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> than <S%G5130>those<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5130>this<s%> man hath <S%G4160>done<s%>?

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1111>murmuring<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4084>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2089>Yet<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> am <S%G1510>I<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G4226>Whither<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3361>him<s%>? will <S%G3195>he<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1290>Dispersion<s%> among the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>?

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G3056>said<s%>, Ye shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G2532>me<s%>; and <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%>, <S%G5210>ye<s%> cannot3756, 1410 <S%G2064>come<s%>?

Now <S%G1722><s%> on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> day of the <S%G1859>feast<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1372>thirst<s%>, let him <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> spake <S%G2036>he<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> they that <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3195>were<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the4151, Numbers <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3754>given<s%>; because <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1392>was<s%> not <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%>.

Some <S%G4183><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G3056>words<s%>, <S%G3056>said<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> of a <S%G230>truth<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

Hath <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%>, the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%>?

The <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1565>they<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Why5101, Acts1 did <S%G71>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?
